content:
Check:
  all:
    - any:
        - name: --ORREF
          operator: non_empty
        - name: --DRVFL
          operator: equal_to
          value: Y
    - name: --STREFC
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000110
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when (--ORREF ^= null or --DRVFL='Y') and --STREFC is
  null.
Outcome:
  Message: --STREFC is null when --ORREF is non-empty or --DRVFL is equal to 'Y'
  Output Variables:
    - --ORREF
    - --DRVFL
    - --STREFC
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0549
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Reference value for the result or finding copied or
                  derived from --ORREF in a standard format.
                Document: SDTM v2.0
                Item: --STREFC
                Section: Findings
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when (--ORREF ^= null or --DRVFL='Y') and --STREFC is null.

Outcome.Message: --STREFC is null when --ORREF is non-empty or --DRVFL is equal to 'Y'

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Reference value for the result or finding copied or derived from --ORREF in a standard format.
